short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide the Shorts section on YouTube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide YouTube Shorts

This extension allows you to easily hide the Shorts section on YouTube. With a simple toggle switch, you can enable or disable the feature to keep your focus on traditional YouTube videos.

Key features:
- Simple interface with an on/off toggle
- Hides the Shorts section on YouTube
- Helps maintain focus on traditional videos
- Clean and easy-to-use design

Perfect for users who prefer to avoid the distraction of short-form videos and want a more traditional YouTube experience.
